messages.content: You are an essay rater specializing in the evaluation of essays written by students from 8th to 12th grade who are learning English as a second language.

Read and evaluate the essay: 

Example essay 1 of score "4.0":
"I disagree, I think if you are honest all the time, you might say some mean things to a person, which might hurt their feelings.

First, being honest is good, that's how you earn trust. However, keep some things to yourself if you think it's not positive to say to another. Second, It might make the person feel bad if you do say something harsh to them. Lastly, A person might see you differently if you're honest constantly, Whether it was nice comment or a mean comment you said.

Firstly, there isn't a lot of honesty when there needs to be at times. Sometimes you have to say what's right in order to not hurt someones feelings from what you said. For example, your friend and yourself have to be honest in some cases to earn each others trust for the other person to be honest in return. Secondly, not being honest might lead you to trouble, if they might have found out you lied to them later. They might give you respect if you're not lying to them and not saying malicious stuff about a person.

Secondly, If you are honest "all the time" some people might see you ask a snitch from the way you are saying everything to a person. For example, a teacher comes up to you and asked you a question on what a person did you would have to be honest and say the truth. I also think that "honesty" and "truth" are a similar word because, you have to do both in order to be honest constantly. The truth is that honesty can get you into a very bad situation if you have to be completely honesty with a teacher. By the wrong person you talk to, you might accidentally start a riot.

Lastly, you should be careful on how honest you are to people, because you don't know whether they are going through some stuff you are pointing out to them. Being truthful to someone and saying everything to them might make them upset on how you view stuff in the world also. Honesty is like an opinion that may cause someone that went through something upset them drastically. This is why I disagree that honesty is the best policy. From the situation you are in say respectful stuff towards the person. It might make you a better person if you are not saying negative things towards a person too.

In conclusion, I disagree with "Honesty is the best policy" by the situation you are in with the person and what they are going through. May cause them to dislike themselves in a way you wouldn't know."

Example essay 2 of score "3.0":
"CURFEWS SAVE TEENAGERS

By Generic_Name

Curfews are a great way to keep teenagers safe and out of trouble.

Teen teenagers who spend too much time on the streets are more likely to get in drugs, curfews will prevent teenagers from spending too much time in the streets. Teenagers offended tend to drive at high speeds at night because the might be drunk, it will prevent then to not get influence by bad people, if this law is approved it will really help keep teenagers safe.

To begin with, in streets at night there are lot bad people, teenagers are expose to a lot of dangers, when they are in the streets at night curfews can prevent this to happen. Teenagers could be kidnapped or raped when they are in the streets at night and some cases they can be forced to do drugs or join gangs, if they dont do this things they might be beaten to death until they do it.

Second reason, There are teenagers at night who tempt to drive at high speeds when they are drunk. This should not be allow because, it can end in car crash, teenagers don't have a lot of experience driving at night. For example, I had a friend who always likes to drive when hi was drunk at hing speeds in the highways at night, One night he had car accident because he was driving drunk and at a high speed he is dead now.

Thirdly, curfew can prevent teenagers from doing things that they are not supposed to do. They might be doing drugs or hanging out in the streets with people that are doing drugs or are in gangs, they can be influenced by bad people from the streets to do drugs. Insulation, my cousin who use to do spent a lot of time in the streets with her friends, she and her friends went to jail because they were doing drugs.

In conclusion, curfew prevents teenagers from getting in trouble, it may prevent teenagers from getting in drugs, also from getting kill in cars accidents. It will keep them away from bad influences, they will stay away from danger people in the streets, but the most important is that this curfews will keep them safe."

Essay to score:
"Can students benefit from taking classes at home? Some may see it as a problem for their child, but others may view it as a way for students to receive the education they need in their lives. Some schools have allowed their students to take classes at home as an option, enabling them to receive education at home while being able to do other things in the meantime. The students receive their education through online or video conferencing, allowing them to be seen working by their teachers. While some may view at-home classes as problematic, agreeing to it can allow students to take as much time as they need for help, enable them to focus more on the subject or task without distractions, and ensure they receive the education necessary for their lives.

One benefit is that students can take as much time as they need when they require help with something. When a student is struggling with homework or studying for a test they need to pass, they can ask a teacher for assistance to understand the problem and how to succeed. The teacher can mark anything that is incorrect on their homework or assignment and help them until they understand their mistakes. With students juggling many subjects and tasks, the potential for stress is high, but with a teacher's help, they can take the time they need to finish. This support can significantly improve a student's chances of success in class.

Another advantage is that students can focus more on the subject or task without distractions. By taking classes at home, a student has a quiet room to concentrate on the given tasks without others diverting their attention. There is no risk of another student interrupting them, causing them to lose focus and forget what they were working on. Teachers want their students to succeed in their classes without any distractions, so they can grasp the material and potentially improve for an upcoming test or quiz.

Furthermore, students will acquire the education they need for their lives. While some might think that what they are learning in class is pointless, teachers strive to impart knowledge that will be useful in students' daily lives. What some may consider a distraction, others view as valuable when helping family and friends. For some, this knowledge is a goal to be set; for others, it is an accomplishment that will assist them through both hard and good times.

While some argue that students may not receive the recommended education they need to succeed in life by taking classes at home, the benefits are clear: students can take the necessary time for help, focus more on their work without distractions, and gain the knowledge essential for their lives. For schools to offer this opportunity for students to choose to take their classes at home and receive the education they need to navigate life will help them improve and potentially teach others who are having similar learning difficulties."

Assign it a score from 1 to 5, in increments of 0.5, based on this rubric:
- A 5-point essay demonstrates native-like facility in the use of language with syntactic variety, appropriate word choice and phrases; well-controlled text organization; precise use of grammar and conventions; rare language inaccuracies that do not impede communication.
- A 4-point essay demonstrates facility in the use of language with syntactic variety and range of words and phrases; controlled organization; accuracy in grammar and conventions; occasional language inaccuracies that rarely impede communication.
- A 3-point essay demonstrates facility limited to the use of common structures and generic vocabulary; organization generally controlled although connection sometimes absent or unsuccessful; errors in grammar and syntax and usage. Communication is impeded by language inaccuracies in some cases.
- A 2-point essay demonstrates inconsistent facility in sentence formation, word choice, and mechanics; organization partially developed but may be missing or unsuccessful. Communication impeded in many instances by language inaccuracies.
- A 1-point essay demonstrates a limited range of familiar words or phrases loosely strung together; frequent errors in grammar (including syntax) and usage. Communication impeded in most cases by language inaccuracies.

Your response should be a JSON object containing only one key: 'score', which should be a numeric value representing the score you gave.

This is because some activities at school are boring, and the people who like to stay after are the ones with a more active system. They enjoy staying for sports or to learn more. People might like to see how fun it could be sometimes, because staying after is not that bad. You can stay at your favorite club or activity. Mine would be to play for the soccer club, and they could see how much fun it could be. Some people would stay for other classes and be interested so they can bring their grades up and get good grades on their report card. Others might go to a club or a technology room because they find it interesting. The principal probably wants students to do something fun and not be bored at home. The principal likely wants them to be a fun person for a day and give everybody a chance to join a club or activity, have fun, and so they can meet other people and learn about them. This way, they won't always be talking to the same people. Sometimes, people need to meet others so they can talk about each other and discuss how much they love the activities. But, in my opinion, I want to disagree at the same time because some people don't like to stay after school. It's boring, and there's nothing fun to do, so they just go home. Some people are just tired and exhausted, and that's why some other people can't even stay to help their parents around the house or take care of their brother or sister. But sometimes, you just get bored and don't even want to stay at the school because you are tired of seeing the classes and the people, or just even learning. Sometimes people say, 'I want to stay,' but they never do. Others say, 'I will stay this time,' and they don't. Some people just don't like to see the school every day; they only come to learn and then leave for home. But other people come and stay because they have nothing to do, or they are just bored at home. So, they go to the after-school activity so they won't be bored and can just have fun."

Essay to score:
"How would things be different if we did not accomplish anything? I believe we, the people, accomplish more if we are doing something because there is movement, and we can have a lot of accomplishments.

When there is movement, we accomplish more things. We accomplish more because we get an idea of what we are doing and how to do it. Our brains get working, and the next time we do something we have already done, we are going to know how to do it because we are using hands-on experience. Also, we are going to do it in a faster amount of time. That way, we accomplish more than just one thing. Thomas Jefferson once wrote, "Determine never to be idle... it is wonderful how much may be done if we are always doing." This means that we should be determined to do something to accomplish more things than we can think of because with determination, we can do many things.

There are many accomplishments we can achieve. We can build schools for people who are not wealthy and live in poverty so they can receive an education. We can also build parks for kids to play in, and so people can go out for a walk or a run. We can also help animals by creating a National Park so that the animals can be taken care of and have a safe habitat. We can also help reduce the use of natural resources so we can have a clean and safe environment. There are many things we can accomplish, but the thing is that we are not doing much, and we are just thinking about all of this, and we never go out and actually accomplish things.

Even though others may believe that we accomplish more when we are inactive because we are using our brains, however, they are wrong because what is the purpose of using our brain if you are not going to do the things we have in mind? It is good to think, but it is not good to keep all the ideas you have in your brain. I think that people who are inactive do not accomplish more than the people who are doing something. The people who are doing something are actually doing things to accomplish more and more. I believe we, the people, accomplish more if we are doing something.

In conclusion, I believe we, the people, accomplish more if we are doing something because there is movement, and we can have a lot of accomplishments. When we have hands-on experience, we accomplish more because we are actually doing something and we are not just sitting around doing nothing to prevent things from happening. With our actions, we accomplish more, and with more accomplishments, we have the better the world will be in the future."

Essay to score:
"I think that people who have nice and good attitudes have a better and more positive chance at having a successful life, unlike those who are disrespectful and rude. You don't want to end up like them because they probably end up living on the streets in a dirty city, regretting your life choices and having too many kids. But with a great attitude, you'll have a different perspective on life. When you have a good attitude, people feel like they can trust you and are more likely to want to be your friend. Also, people with great attitudes can get better opportunities in life than those who are mean and ungrateful.

In life, if you want people to trust you, you're going to need to be nice and caring. They're going to be like, 'I like that guy; he has a nice attitude.' You can get friends who know you and think that you can be trustworthy. I remember when I was 11 years old, my older sister had a 2-year-old baby named Generic_Name. She was visiting to take my mama to the doctor's appointment. Then they said that they couldn't take my baby niece because she would just be crying the whole time. I knew that my mama and my sister knew I could take care of the baby. So it was just me, my baby niece, and my younger sister, but she didn't do much. They came back in 2 hours and they said, 'Mama and I, we could trust in you.'

When you have a good, confident attitude, you can get better opportunities in your life, like when you want to apply for college or for a high-paying job. They are most likely to pick the one who is generous, kind, and confident. One time, my brother Generic_Name was applying for college. He sent his form to the college's online website and was so confident when he sent it. A few days later, he got the mail; the college wrote back, 'We want you to come talk to us about if we want you at our school.' My brother Generic_Name is one of the most generous and confident people I know, so I knew he would get into the school. He did get into the school and now he studies at Generic_School.

This all means that having good attitudes and a positive perspective on life will give you people who you can trust and better opportunities in your life. Just by having good attitudes."

Essay to score:
""Be you, there are no gimmicks," Kobe Bryant once said. Your character will be what you choose to make it, whether it's good or bad; it's all in your hands. This has its own benefits: you will find your passion, surround yourself with the right group of people, and have no regrets at the end.

You will find what you are passionate about. Finding your passion is one of the hardest things to do, so start searching at an early age. "Once you have something you love to do, you will never work a day in your life," Kobe Bryant remarked. To find your passion, you have to be yourself. Most people aren't lucky enough to find what they love. "If you wake up mad about going to work, do something else. I was lucky enough to find my passion," he said. And if you choose to do something because of your friends, good luck, because they probably like their job, but you will be wasting more energy. Every person has their box; your box might not be as beautiful as mine, but you have to dance beautifully in the box you are comfortable in.

Find influence and be an influence. It is easy to find influence or inspiration once you know your passion. My influences have changed over the years, but my passion for basketball remains the same. I used to just like the sport, but my love for it started to fade away until I heard about basketball legend Kobe Bryant. Because of Kobe Bryant, I fell in love with the sport. Not only was basketball my life, but I now loved everything about it: the smell of the ball, the sound of the dribble, and the smooth leather of the ball. I've drawn a lot from Kobe's game and his off-the-court experiences. Now, I try to influence younger kids to work on their craft.

Regretting something at the end is one of the worst things ever. If you followed someone else's dream, passion, or footsteps without realizing what you are doing is wrong, you will regret it after retiring. You will regret not following your own dreams and not making your own character. "I have no regrets. I left everything on the court every single day, so now that I'm retired, I have zero regrets," Kobe Bryant said. Find your passion, be the best at it, and at the end of the day, you will have no regrets.

Some might say you need an influence to work hard; I agree. However, there is no point in getting influenced if you don't know what influence you are looking for. Be yourself; you will find your passion, find the inspiration or influence that you may need, and have no regrets at the end. Go and make your own character."

Essay to score:
""Determine never to be idle... It is wonderful how much may be done if we are always doing." According to Thomas Jefferson's quote, inactivity is not a way to achieve our goals; we should be always working and striving towards them. It is hard to believe that the most effective way to accomplish something is by being busy and always doing something. Although some people say that we accomplish more when we are inactive than when we are always doing something because we have more time to set our goals, in reality, we accomplish more when we are active because we have more time to keep working on our goals to achieve them sooner, and we don't waste time that can be used to work on our goals.

Some people argue that we accomplish more when we are inactive than when we are always doing something because we have more time to set our goals. The main reason these people believe that inactivity serves an important purpose is that they get more time to think about what they want to do in their life and have their goals already planned. According to The New York Times, people who take moments of inactivity are usually confident and sure about what they want to do in their life, and what goals they want to set and achieve. In addition, they are more motivated and put more effort into their goals.

However, we accomplish more when we are always doing something because we have more time to keep working on our goals to achieve them sooner. Being always active and working is the best way to achieve our goals. According to a study from Generic School, all the people who are now successful were always working on their goals and never had a moment where they thought they had to stop and wait because the accomplishment was about to come. We always have to be working; our goals will never come easily. As we keep working on our goals, they will come to us sooner.

We accomplish more when we are always doing something because we don't waste time that can be used to work on our goals. Sometimes when we are working hard on our goals, there's a time where we think that we have to stop and rest, but we shouldn't do that because that would be a waste of time that could be used to keep working. The right person to say that is my dad. When he was a teenager and had already graduated, he wanted to become an Industrial Engineer, but he didn't want to go to college right after he graduated. He wanted to wait and be inactive for at least one year before entering college, but that was a big mistake because during that time he didn't get a job, so he used a part of the money that he would have used for college. Now he is not an Industrial Engineer; he never achieved his goal because he wasted the time that he could have used to achieve it.

Though some people say that inactivity is more effective than activity in accomplishing goals because it is a better way to set our goals, being active is the best way to accomplish them because we can achieve our goals sooner and we don't waste useful time. In conclusion, as you can see, inactivity will not be the best way because the reality is that we can achieve our goals and get a lot of wonderful things just by being always active. Stopping to have a good moment of relaxing might be awesome, but nothing compares to having what you want in life and doing things that will show our effort and dedication."

Essay to score:
"Why do people always think that having problems is a bad thing? I believe that encountering a problem is an opportunity for you to rise again and try another approach. When faced with a problem, not only can you learn from your mistakes, but you can also identify what went wrong and seek guidance from someone who has succeeded, to discover a better way of assisting you. Additionally, you can observe and consider the actions of those around you who have previously succeeded.

Learning from your mistakes by observing successful individuals around you isn't as negative as it may seem. It's a chance to start anew, armed with the knowledge that the method you previously tried was ineffective, and with an understanding of what to do differently before revisiting your past work. For instance, you might encounter a challenging project that requires you to persist through errors to build a strong understanding of it. If you make a mistake in a relationship, it doesn't mean you must end it; instead, you can work through the issues, strive to improve, and learn from the experience. At some point in life, you will face a challenge that demands repeated attempts, as this is a period for introspection and deciding how to move forward from past errors.

When you encounter a problem, you shouldn't shoulder the worry alone; seek help from someone who has faced a similar issue. Their advice, born from experience, can be invaluable. For example, scientists often make mistakes but persevere until they achieve satisfactory results. Math teachers may struggle with difficult questions, but they continue to work through them until they find the correct solution. We all face problems daily, yet we don't give up; we persist until the issue is resolved, no matter how long it takes. When confronted with a problem, it's our chance to excel by seeking assistance and learning from our mistakes. Often, when working on a project assigned by professors or teachers, students may doubt their approach. How can you know if you're on the right track if you haven't consulted the person who assigned the project or someone who has already succeeded?

I concur that a problem presents an opportunity to excel because it allows you to seek help from peers or to learn from your mistakes and observe others. It's important to confide in a friend or someone you trust about your struggles and how they can support and comfort you. By not repeating the same errors, you can learn from your mistakes and find solutions to your problems."

Essay to score:
"I must say that I disagree with the idea of having distance learning for our students to take classes from their homes. I suggest we continue with the traditional method, as it seems to be a better option.

The first reason why is that many teachers can maintain their jobs and continue working as they are accustomed to. This means that many teachers won't have to lose their positions. There are likely a lot of them who prefer having a classroom full of students, or some may find it easier or more enjoyable to communicate with students in person. This interaction can sometimes be beneficial for the students.

The second reason is that students can learn to be more social with their peers, which can lead to better communication skills with other people. For example, it would be much easier for them to secure a job on their own because it makes them more confident in themselves, and this confidence can improve their performance in almost all their classes.

The third reason is that schools can still be used normally, as long as everything is okay with them, and they can still serve many purposes for students. However, some people argue that allowing students to take classes from home through online or video conferencing might provide a more flexible schedule because they are in their homes. But I believe this might disrupt the students' learning, especially if they don't have access to Wi-Fi or transportation, like having to go to a library. That's why I take this position against taking classes online."

"I think students at a young age should not commit to a career for many reasons. I believe students should not commit to a career early on because they might change their minds. Some students could feel like they don't want to work in that career anymore because it has become boring or is no longer interesting. Also, students might find another career that captures their attention and would like to pursue it more than the last, even if they might not stay long.

The cycle can go on and on with finding different careers, leading to indecision about which career to choose and what is best.

Some students get bored easily, lose interest, have less fun, lose focus, and there are many more reasons to stop working in a career and find a new one. Some students know what they want, but those who don't are lost, confused, and stuck. That's why students should not commit to a career at a young age because they still don't know what they want, and even if they think they do, they might not always stay the course. They can change. Students at a young age still have their whole lives ahead of them. It's like they are still babies, and some are still learning to process things, experience, and imagine.

They might think certain things will happen, but in reality, there are storms to weather, and sometimes it's not that easy to get through them. They still live in their own fairy tale world. Some don't take a career seriously and think it's all fun and games because they are still young and don't think properly. Students aren't mature enough to take on responsibilities until they struggle or are old enough to take action for themselves."

Essay to score:
"Thomas Jefferson once wrote a sentence that says, "Determine never to be idle. It is wonderful how much may be done if we are always doing." That saying raises the question: do we accomplish more if we are always active, or does inactivity also serve a purpose? Most people believe that inactivity does serve a purpose, and here is why: it allows our brains to rest, and without rest, we would eventually pass out from exhaustion, and our brains wouldn't function at 100%. 

One of the reasons why people agree with inactivity serving a purpose is that it allows our brain to rest. For example, when you have had a stressful day at work, you'll want to relax and do nothing at home. Doing so will allow your brain to recover and process things better, and you'll return to work stress-free and ready for the next day. Also, when I was in the 10th grade, I got really stressed out about not advancing to the next grade. It wasn't until I took a day off and did nothing school-related that I realized I could get after-school help to stay on track. This was one of the reasons why inactivity serves a purpose. 

The last reason why inactivity serves a purpose is that without rest, you would eventually pass out from exhaustion, and your brain wouldn't work at 100 percent. For instance, there have been cases where people have passed out from working too hard and not getting enough sleep. Moreover, if you don't rest your brain, it won't function at full capacity. It has been proven that 95% of people who pass out do so mainly because of exhaustion. 

Thus, this is why you should rest and take time to relax now and then. 

Some people may argue that you do accomplish more by working continuously, like gaining more knowledge. However, it has been proven that people pass out due to a lack of sleep from work or school. Also, you shouldn't risk your health just to gain more knowledge. 

In conclusion, inactivity plays a major role in your mental health. Being inactive allows you to rest, and without proper rest, you would eventually pass out from exhaustion, and your brain wouldn't function at 100%. Overall, this is why inactivity serves a purpose in life."

Essay to score:
"BENEFITS OF A FOUR-DAY SCHOOL WEEK

Getting enough sleep is one of the best things one could ever have! This is equivalent to having an extra day off at work or school. Therefore, schools should adopt the habit of a four-day school week by extending the school day by two hours. The benefits of changing to a four-day school week include conserving energy and resources, improving academic performance, and providing enough time to complete school assignments.

The amount of energy and resources used at school for a whole week is more than what we use at home. Examples of such are electricity and water. The more we use, the more the school pays for it. That one extra day off reduces expenses in respect of food services, transportation, and utilities.

Not only does the school conserve energy and resources, but it also offers teachers and students an additional day for rest every week. As a result, there is less stress over schoolwork. Students feel less pressured because they have enough rest at home before coming to school. This is an important factor that helps improve the academic performance of students.

Notwithstanding the fact that the school conserves energy and resources and provides enough rest, students will also have enough time to complete their assignments. Most students complain that they do not get time at home to finish up with the homework given to them by their teachers. When this continuously happens, it could drag down their grades. Having an additional day, making it a three-day weekend instead of two, will give them more time to prepare for tests and study at their own pace.

Switching to a four-day school week will help change a lot. It would have a positive effect on the school, students, and as well as the parents."

My name is Generic_Name, and I am eager to join your team. This letter is to express why I believe I would be an asset to your company. My suitability for the role may hinge on my skills and level of responsibility. I am proud to say that I am responsible. In school, I was a very good teenager and a student with good grades, not to brag. However, I must admit that initiating conversations is not my strong suit, which I mention just in case.

In college, I was a diligent student, though not one to achieve straight A's—I was more of an average student.

I can be helpful for two reasons: I am a helpful person by nature, and I strive to make others feel that I am a good person who can contribute positively to their lives. I hope you will come to see me as a helpful individual because I aim to fulfill my mission of being the best person my parents have always wanted. I don't want them—or myself—to feel that I was born for nothing. It bothers me when people are upset or angry, as I tend to feel responsible. That's why I am driven to solve other people's problems. I don't want to let them down; I want to be someone who does things right.

Now, let's discuss my personality and work preferences. As I mentioned, I'm not the best at starting conversations, but I am a very talkative person. I enjoy talking, though I admit I can become a bit annoying and tire after a while. My speaking pace can be quite fast, depending on my mood. However, if I am in a bad mood, I will control myself because I respect others and don't want them to think my mood reflects on the job. Regardless of whether I am mad, sad, happy, or indifferent, I will remain respectful no matter what.

As for the type of job I am seeking, I am open to any position you believe suits me. I live by the motto, 'No job is too big, no job is too small.' I am confident I can handle any task you assign to me.

In conclusion, I hope you will consider my application. I may have the potential to make a significant impact on your life or your company's success. I look forward to the possibility of becoming one of the best employees you have ever had.

Sincerely,
Generic_Name :)"

Essay to score:
"Impressions

Imagine that each person has different impressions, like when they learn about bad things that happen in their lives or great things that lead them to have fantastic impressions. I disagree with this statement because it is likely that each impression we have is based on the actions of others. You may have many impressions about something you believe is terrible, but if you investigate it, you might conclude that it's not as bad as you thought, so your impression can change. It's not impossible for impressions to change.

First, it is possible for us to change our impressions when we encounter something good or sometimes bad. We often think that everything we see is real, but we never truly understand what is happening in real life. Also, the first impression we have of another person is not always accurate because we don't know who they are or what they want. Therefore, we shouldn't say bad things about them; we need to get to know the person first and share experiences with them. Only then can we judge them fairly. Sometimes, bad impressions are harmful because some people have health problems, and when they learn about something very bad, they can become depressed or so sad that they don't want to do anything.

In life, we have many impressions that are incredible, like when we have the opportunity to get a great job. We have the best impression when we first arrive, seeing the place and what others do, and sharing moments with them is great. However, over time, our impression may change because it is not the same as in the beginning. Maybe now you have problems with your colleagues, and the impression you have of them has altered. It is common for our impressions about things or people we consider friends to evolve.

At the beginning of the year, I had a friend for whom I had great affection. In my opinion, she was the best friend I had, but over time she changed. She treated me poorly and did many bad things, so my impression changed. I don't know if others feel the same because my impressions change quickly when I see things I don't like. At the same time, I wondered why she changed towards me. I was sad because the person I considered my friend had become just another acquaintance. "Many people should try to do something beyond what they have already mastered. Without venturing into new areas, individuals will never grow; they will remain stagnant, repeating the same tasks they have mastered. It is beneficial to try something else, something never experienced before, to learn new things instead of sticking to what is already known. I believe that when people engage in different types of activities they are not accustomed to, they will be able to learn new skills, better themselves, and surpass their previous limitations. In my opinion, once you have mastered one skill, you should attempt to learn another, thereby becoming more adept and growing to be successful in all that life presents. If you continue doing the same thing you have already mastered, you are missing an opportunity to learn something new that could enhance your abilities and provide more life experience.

Students in school sometimes receive the same classes every year, classes they have already mastered. They could be learning something new to become more capable in every aspect, but instead, they miss out on new experiences. When you are engaged in the same activity all the time, there comes a moment when you grow tired of repeating it. At some point in your life, you may feel that you have missed the opportunity to learn something different, and it may seem like a waste of time—time that could have been spent trying something new instead of what you have already mastered.

In my opinion, I agree with Emerson's statement because he encourages people to look beyond and not just stay focused on the same thing all the time. He suggests moving on to other things after mastering one, so you can grow and become successful in life. Emerson implies that 'people who do the same thing they have already mastered will never grow.'

In conclusion, people should practice something other than what they have mastered, so they can grow and learn new things, thereby becoming successful in life. Individuals will never develop by doing the same thing repeatedly; they need to look beyond and not just remain in the same place. I think Emerson's statement is a good reminder for people to move on in life and look beyond what they have already mastered."

"We are living our lives in a crowded world with thousands of people. We all have something in common, whether it be the same color hair, tone of the skin, or color of the eyes, but everyone's personality is different. It can be good for you and bad for others, or the opposite. However, being yourself can be one of the greatest accomplishments these days.

One reason why being yourself can be the greatest thing in this world is that the world and people's behaviors are obstacles to being you; they would try to change you. A second reason is that being yourself is important to find out who we are and what purpose we want to achieve in our life; that's one step. The last reason is that if you are yourself, the world is on your side, and with that, you have a big weapon to make a difference. That's why I agree with Emerson's statement that 'To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.'

The world is constantly trying to make us become something else, but the world is us, humans.

One or a group of persons can be either good or bad influences in our lives. They literally can push us to do anything if we give them control of our lives. For example, in the United States, we have a higher percentage of shootings in high schools and stores. The majority of them are committed by two or more persons. The police reports that I have read constantly give more years in jail to the main responsible. To me, one of them was a bad influence; they become an obstacle for themselves and for those that they kill. Fairly, both of them get to pay for what they have done. However, that's why we need to know who we call friends and family because they can push you to do things that maybe you don't want to do; they become an obstacle. Furthermore, if you do anything that they want, you totally lose yourself and always be the way that they want you to be. That's why we need to find out who we are, find ourselves, and a purpose.

It is important that we find out who we are and what purpose we want to achieve in our lives. To me, personally, it is hard to know everything about myself; sometimes I do things that I never thought about. There is one phrase that is inside of me; it says, 'If you don't know yourself, how do you pretend to know others?' That phrase reflects to me how we pretend to go against the world if we don't even know who we are. We basically do what we see in the world. There is violence, murders, economic problems, rapists, robbers, and more. In addition, this includes how important it is to give ourselves a purpose. It is important because if you are focused on your goal, for example, you want to be a doctor, you spend a lot of time studying and working that you would forget about what is going on in the world, you are going to ignore problems and other people's lives and be focused on yourself to achieve your purpose. Once you get to be yourself, the world is on your side, and with that, you make a difference, and that becomes a big accomplishment.

Personality works better when it is positive, and you have a good heart; you get to support others, and they support you. If you have everything under control, know who you are, and your purposes, the world would be on your side. That makes a difference to you and others, becoming successful and a great influence on others. For example, the majority of us have read documentaries about people who had an impact on the world to make it better.

For example, Malala, she was a young lady who decided to fight against her government to get the right to study; in her country, women were not allowed to go to school. Malala was very confident in believing in herself, and she knew what the purpose was. As time passed, Malala achieved her accomplishments; now, thanks to her and all those that gave their support, women are allowed to have an education. Malala is a great example to believe that being yourself is the greatest accomplishment.

In conclusion, the world and people's behaviors can be big obstacles to us; it can be friends or family members. That's why we need to know ourselves and learn how to know others. It is important to give ourselves a purpose so we would get focused and ignore the problems that are going on in the world, and while that time, we would be finding ourselves.

Once we have confidence in ourselves and know the purpose in our lives, everything would be very different. The world would be on our side, and that's a big weapon to support others and help the world to become better. In my opinion, I agree with the idea that being yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment."

Many people appear very different, but in reality, we are the same, and kindness is one of the many things that make us alike.

Essay to score:
"The school bus doors close with a hiss behind you as you walk down your driveway. You enter your house and sigh with boredom. Once again, the rest of your family is out participating in activities, and you are left alone at home with nothing to do. This situation has occurred to many people who don't participate in any extracurricular activities. I believe that all students should participate in at least one extracurricular activity because students will be able to meet new people, find a new passion, and it gives them something to do.

If you are looking to meet new people, joining an extracurricular activity is a great way to do it. It is easier to make friends with people with whom you share common interests. So, it will be less difficult for you to talk to someone who has joined the same club as you because all of the people in that club at least share the common interest of the subject of the club. Participating in the same activity and being in the same room encourages you to talk to people. When I am at swim practice, I am encouraged to talk to the people in my lane because we are swimming together for one and a half hours, so why not get to know them? Because of this, I have made new friends outside of school, and I regularly spend time with my new friends outside of swim practice as well. Meeting new people is only one benefit of extracurricular activities; however, there are many more.

It is hard to discover hidden passions if you don't try new and different activities. Through these new activities, you could discover that you have a strong interest in robotics that you were not aware of before. If you find an activity that you are passionate about, your life will be much more exciting and enriching. It can also help you figure out what type of career you want to pursue when you grow up. Naturally, people will want to pursue careers that are related to subjects they are interested in. So, it will be much easier for you to decide because you have discovered your passions and talents at an earlier age. My father signed me up for theatre one year, and when he first told me, I was apprehensive. I am naturally a shy person, so I didn't think that I would enjoy being on stage in front of a large crowd of people. But, I ended up really enjoying the whole experience and participated in that theatre camp for three more years. Also, when I first started taking piano lessons, I thought that it would be a huge waste of time. But, I found that I was quite talented at playing the piano, and I enjoyed creating music that my family and friends loved listening to. Extracurricular activities help you uncover new passions, and they also provide you with something to do.

Participating in an extracurricular activity is a productive way to use your time. Many students come home and waste time on the internet or social media because they have nothing better to do. There is nothing worse than coming home and finding out that your child spent four hours watching cartoons on TV. An activity would give them something to think about or allow them to spend their time somewhere productive. When I have nothing to do at home, I play the piano because it is a great way for me to use excess time, and I enjoy doing it. On the days that I am not at swim practice, I would feel like I have too much time on my hands. But, I have other extracurricular activities scheduled for those days, like meeting with my math team or piano lessons, which prevent me from experiencing painful boredom. These are only a few reasons why students should participate in extracurricular activities, and it can be seen that there are significant benefits.

In conclusion, students should participate in extracurricular activities because they give you something productive to do, they help you find new passions, and allow you to meet new people. Every student should choose one extracurricular activity to participate in because of the plentiful benefits these activities provide. Suddenly, you realize that today was the first day of track practice, and you frantically call your friend, asking them if they can come pick you up and bring you back to school. When they arrive, you hurriedly jump into their car and anxiously wait during the drive back to school. Once you are finally there, you burst out of the car and hurry down to the track. Luckily, the coach had only just started with stretches, so you put down your bag and stretch with the rest of the team. Throughout the rest of practice, you laugh with a new friend whom you would have never met if you hadn't joined the track team."

"As a middle school student, I would advise elementary students not to do drugs, use Juul, or drink alcohol. The reason I'm telling them this is because their lungs could get ruined, and they might not be able to breathe well, possibly requiring an oxygen tank. Additionally, if they do it repeatedly, they could become addicted and may continue the habit for their entire life. Another reason to avoid it is the risk of influencing their friends to try it, who might also become addicted.

My second piece of advice is to avoid getting into trouble, especially when you're at risk of receiving six broken pillars. Then you'll have to attend a meeting with your parents and all your teachers, or sometimes just with your teachers. If you do receive six broken pillars, you will have lunch detention and won't be able to hang out with your friends during lunch, which you'll probably prefer over sitting quietly alone. Another reason to avoid trouble is the Behavioral Intervention Program (BIP). Why avoid it? BIP is a room you go to if you've done something bad.

Third, don't do foolish things like getting in trouble for running in the hallways, play fighting, or talking back to a teacher. These are some of the silliest reasons to get into trouble, especially when you're in a rush to get to class or lunch. Other reasons for getting into trouble include being tardy, and if you're tardy, you will receive a broken pillar unless you have a note from a teacher or a valid excuse.

The fourth reason is to get involved in school activities like basketball, track, soccer, volleyball, or whatever sport you play. It's beneficial because it helps your muscles stay strong. Also, try to keep your grades up and not let them slip because if they do, you won't be able to participate in events, especially important ones. One reason to stay out of trouble is that if you don't, you could get kicked off the team.

In conclusion, it's better to stay out of trouble because your parents might get upset and restrict your participation in activities. Also, strive to get better grades so you can succeed in life like other people or one of your family members. You could also land a better job or acquire a better house and car. You might even enjoy a better lifestyle."

Some people believe curfews will keep teenagers out of trouble for these reasons. Others believe that curfews unfairly interfere in young people's lives because they need to experience the real world at night, go to movies, and have fun as teens. First, curfews will keep teenagers out of trouble because there will be no midnight parties. At midnight parties, there can be a lot of trouble; people can even do dangerous things. For example, when a teen goes to a midnight party, they will most likely smoke or drink, and when they get high or wasted, they may do something dangerous, like driving home drunk, which will most likely lead to car crashes, or the police may chase them. That is why the curfew is there to keep teenagers out of trouble.

Secondly, curfews will help a lot in keeping teenagers out of trouble because there will be no playing out at night. When teens are out at night, they make reckless decisions and do dangerous things that can get them into a lot of trouble. For example, when I was in my country, Liberia, we used to go out at night and play, but one night something bad happened. There was this boy named Generic_Name; he took a rock and threw it up in the air. Then the rock started to come down, but no one could see it because it was night. There was this girl named Generic_Name who was right under where the rock was coming down, but did not know it. The rock hit her on the head, and she started to bleed. That's why playing out at night is not safe. Curfews will help keep teens safe.

However, not everyone agrees that curfews will help keep teenagers out of trouble. Otherwise, curfews will help keep teenagers out of trouble because going to a friend's house at night is not good; a lot of bad things happen there at night, and most teens don't have the best judgment when it comes to staying out of trouble, so the curfew will help them with that.

In conclusion, curfews will keep teens out of trouble. No midnight parties, and no going to friends' houses at night. "Generic_Name

English 12

Generic_Name

October 18, 2018

Cellphones are a distraction in school

Should teachers let students use their cell phones during class? Some people think cell phones in school are a great help for their classwork. Others believe students take advantage of these devices during class time. I think cell phones are a distraction to students during school and at home. Although some argue students should be allowed to use their cell phones for educational purposes because they are a good source for finding research on a topic in class, in reality, cell phones are a distraction in school because students take these devices for granted to play games and for entertainment, such as Netflix and YouTube.

Those who think that students should use their cellphones in school for education only have their reasons. Students argue that they should be allowed to use their cell phones for anything they miss during class or in case of an emergency. I believe students take their cell phones for granted when they are allowed to use them during class.

Students have lost their focus in school and are more focused on games. According to social media, a game is trending around the world and it's called Fortnite. Kids today are captivated by playing Fortnite or any kind of games. Students get out of focus when they are bored. Teachers get annoyed when they are trying to teach and one of their students isn't giving them the attention because they are playing games on their phones. Students don't focus on their work and don't even do their homework at home because they are busy playing games or engaging in other distractions. Some kids don't get enough sleep, staying up until 3 in the morning playing online games with others. These kids don't have enough energy in school and fall asleep during class. Some believe that Fortnite or any kind of game has taken over these students' attention.

What will happen in the next episode? What have they uploaded today? Netflix and YouTube have become significant distractions for some students today. Some students get anxious to see what happens next on a show they are watching on Netflix or wondering what a YouTuber has uploaded today. Some teachers report that kids in their class hide behind their book bags or under their desks to watch entertainment. Some students don't pay attention or notice what they are doing when they are engrossed in a show. Parents complain when their students have low grades, not realizing their kids have been playing games or watching shows on their cell phones during class time.

In conclusion, I believe cell phones are a distraction for students in class and at home. Using time wisely with these devices will help both teachers and students. There is enough time to play games, watch shows, or view YouTube videos. Students should finish all their classwork, pay attention to teachers, and complete their homework first when they come home from school, then there will be no complaints from anyone. Students will stay on track in school, and no one will be left behind!"

"I can understand why people's first impressions are hard to change. It's because of how you talk to them the first time. They might have responded to you in a bad way, such as with a rude manner, attitude, or by ignoring you, etc. That will just create a bad impression of yourself. On the other hand, if you have a positive vibe and attitude, your first impression is likely to be good. People will think that you are willing to work hard and set good standards. That's what they look for when you take interviews for jobs.

First impressions are hard to change, and the reason I say this is because no one likes a negative person. If you walk into a job interview with a bad impression, they're most likely not even going to hire you. When you meet someone for the first time, are you going to be negative about it or positive? Most people, if not everyone, will say positive. Why, you may ask? Because they don't want to make a fool of themselves. If you choose to be negative, you'll regret it, because people will not just want to talk to you; they'll talk badly about you, saying, 'He's not a good person,' or 'He has a bad attitude,' etc.

Now, let's say you have a positive attitude while meeting new people. They'll like you instead of not wanting to talk to you. That's what you call a good first impression because you did not have an attitude, you did not ignore them, and you kept a positive vibe while talking to them. And if you keep that same attitude, they will want to talk to you again because you didn't treat them badly. Another thing about first impressions is that many people are going to ask what you do for a living, and that's a good thing because you can have a humane and chill conversation with them. Many people just ask questions, and you give them an answer; that's not really a conversation. A conversation is when you actually get to know each other and share what you like to do and what your hobbies are, etc. So, in conclusion, have a good first impression; it'll take you far in life. No matter how bad your day went, just smile because there will always be another day."

"SCHOOL VACATION

Summer vacation is better than winter vacation. Some people travel to another country or state of the United States because they do not like the cold; they prefer hot places. I disagree with some teachers who argue that there should be year-round schools, where there would be a 3-4 week break in the summer, a longer winter break, and a week off in the spring. But we study for about 8-9 months; why do they want more time to study?

If they want a longer winter, how can we enjoy it? Because in the winter, there's snow, too much cold, and we can just stay at home, which will lead to stress. I prefer a longer summer break because we can practice sports, go to the beach, and cook outside (like carne asada).

Practicing sports is good for our bodies, something we can do in the summer. Sports like soccer, baseball, and running on the street with our friends are enjoyable. Soccer is a sport that we can practice in the summer because you can form a team and compete in a big league with other teams, make new friends in that league, and if you like soccer, maybe you can join a big team like Barcelona, Galaxy, or Real Madrid. The benefits of practicing sports include taking care of your health because you won't be looking at your mobile phone, which can damage your eyes. You'll be a happier person without stress, and you'll maintain a good physique instead of staying in bed and getting fat. Also, you can learn about sports you don't know; if you have friends who know how to play, they can teach you. After learning, you'll feel good when your friends talk about it because you can share your opinion, whereas before, you couldn't because you didn't know about the sport.

Another great thing to do in the summer is to go to the beach with your family to enjoy the sun, the sand, and watch the sharks swim out to sea. Watching the sunrise over the sea and exclaiming 'wow' is breathtaking. If you have money, you can travel to another country where you can find coconuts or palm trees, like Mexico, where you can enjoy 'agua de coco' or sleep under a palm tree without a care in the world. You'll forget, for a moment, all the bad things like work, study, enemies, etc. That's another reason I want a longer summer: to forget all my troubles for a while and gain more energy to start a new school year. I really enjoyed last summer because we had three months, and I went to different countries to enjoy the sea. I built sandcastles with my brother and ate a lot of shellfish. I like shellfish because my father told me that when I was young, I would be strong because shellfish contain a lot of vitamins. I didn't like them at first, but when we traveled, he would say if I didn't eat the shellfish, I wouldn't get any other food that day. So I was scared, and that was the first time I tried some. Now I love shellfish; whenever we go to the beach, my family at the hotel orders some because now the whole family likes shellfish. It's the first food we eat.

Carne asada is another thing I can do in the summer. 'Carne asada' means barbecue, a name for food that Latin America calls. To make carne asada, you need to have a clear sky because when you cook, you need to have your grill outside the house. I can't do this during the winter because it's cold, and I would freeze. That's why I prefer a longer summer to cook carne asada many times and share it with my friends or family. We can also go to the park and cook there. It's beautiful when I do this because all my family comes to my house, and we can talk about our stories. When my grandfather talks, everyone has to be quiet because he talks about his past life and his ideas for a good future for us. We can also dance to any music we like. These are moments I can't forget because in winter, all these things end.

Summer is a time that most people like because you can do many things, enjoy time with your family and friends. In winter, you can only stay at home, watch television, use your phone, play Fortnite, etc. I don't like all those things; I like to enjoy my youth. When you are young, you have to explore your mind, make new friends, and I believe you can't do this at home; you would die of boredom without friends. That's why I prefer a longer summer because if they give me just 3-4 weeks of summer, I can't do anything, and I won't want to come back to school; I will be bored. Summer is the time when we can enjoy and do many things to prepare for the winter because in winter, you can't work or travel. So summer is very important."

For example, if your mom tells you to go to your room and study for your test tomorrow, but you refuse and she grounds you for a week, you'll likely learn to do better. It's best to solve your problem because you understand it best. No matter how difficult the problem is, do your best to solve it and never let your hopes falter because it's hard or even if nobody helps you. You always have your family to support you. And even if others mock you for your problems, continue to fight and always heed your parents' advice, as they are older than you and have experienced more. 

Never let others bring you down because you are strong and intelligent. Don't become angry over what people say about you; instead, confront your own problems and always trust yourself. Help yourself with the issues you face, allowing your mind to open so that when another problem arises, you can solve it easily. For instance, when you build a company and a significant problem arises, the leader must resolve the issue, or the company may fail. Some problems can be minor, and some can be challenging. Everyone faces problems, even children, so if you are going through a tough time, don't give up because it's difficult. You can face a problem without even realizing it. Sometimes the problems you encounter can hurt your feelings. For example, if your girlfriend cheats on you and you don't know how to deal with it, you can ask your parents or a trusted adult for help. Some problems may be family-related, such as grieving over the death of a family member. You can take a few days to rest and then tell your parents how you feel, and they will come to comfort you so that you can overcome it. A problem may be hard to get past, but once you do, you will be fine and won't have any problems ever again because you'll be able to face any challenge that comes your way."

Essay to score:
"Why do we need to change first impressions?

It's a bad idea to say that first impressions are almost impossible to change. Sometimes we don't have time to dress formally for an occasion, or we don't know what the occasion is. Nevertheless, people are expected to dress appropriately for specific events. An experience I had was when I took my first job; I dressed formally.

When you have the opportunity to change first impressions, you can, but not just with your dress. You need to represent your intelligence and your capacity to work with others, which is who you are.

People need to dress appropriately for different occasions. When you go to your first job interview, your dress should be formal. The first impression is what people remember when they hear your name; it's the first thing that comes to mind. It's really hard for a person not to want to change for new opportunities in the future. Most people disagree with this because not everyone thinks the same way. It's hard to make decisions when people don't want to help you because your first impression was really bad. Some people have different opinions; in my own opinion, your dress reflects who you are and the emotions you have.

The experiences in my life have taught me this. When I wake up in the morning, I dress appropriately to go to school because you need to be a good person, a good student. But if your dress is appropriate and you make bad choices or verbal actions, it affects your first impression. The first impression is like your 'photo'; it's who you are and what you represent, but nevertheless, your 'photo' can be changed with your actions. In my opinion, you need to represent whatever your personality is, or if you have a good leader in your life and you want to be like him or her, that's fine. Personally, I want to grow up to be like my grandfather and my mom because he has strong opinions about life and work. My mom is a good woman who has a lot of experience, and she has always been good at her work and very responsible. That's an impression, a good 'photo', for people to remember her by.

Intelligence can be more than how you look. It's not impossible to change. People change, contrary to those who believe that it's not possible to change first impressions. The world has many who are selfish and critical just because of how you look or where you're from. Everyone has a different culture and habits; some people actually like another's culture or habits. People judge a book by its cover. Intelligence is the foundation of entering the world, but if your first impression was terrible, it's bad. You need to continue and work to give a better impression to other people.

In conclusion, it's a really bad idea to say that first impressions are almost impossible to change. It's possible to change; for example, in my life, when I started my job, I was nervous at the first meeting, but I wanted to make a good impression on my boss. I work in a restaurant, and sometimes I need to talk with customers. My first impression and my verbal impression are important for improving and working better with different types of people. Your impression also makes people judge you, for better or worse. Impressions are important for various reasons. In my own opinion, I disagree with the notion that first impressions are set in stone, and I believe that people who think differently have more self-esteem and the ability to change their first impression. Try to be yourself."

Essay to score:
"Have you ever experienced wisdom with someone? Well, I have, many times with my mom. My mom helps me by preventing bad things. For example, one day my friend and I wanted to walk to the store by ourselves, and we asked my mom if we could go. However, my mom didn't let us because she said we could get kidnapped. Similarly, one day, my mom and her friend were walking by themselves and they almost got kidnapped, so we didn't go. It is important to know people's experiences so you won't make the same mistakes they did, learn from their experiences, and help yourself by preventing bad things. Experiences are always shared and are very important.

The first reason why you should share experiences with people is to prevent yourself from making the same mistakes as others. You can also make a better choice. For instance, one day, I went to the doctor's and I had to get a flu shot, but I didn't want it because I don't like shots. Then, my mom told me that once she had to get a flu shot and didn't, and the next day she got sick. So then I decided to get the flu shot. Making the same mistake as someone else is not fun, so listening to people's experiences is a great way to prevent repeating those mistakes. Many people make mistakes and learn from them. Mistakes are always made, but not when you have already been warned.

The second reason is to learn from experiences. Learning from another person's experience can help you by showing you how to do something well. For example, one day, I was doing something wrong and my teacher came to me, talked to me so I wouldn't do it again, and showed me how to do it in a better way. Doing things in a better way can be much easier. Never give up when you can't do something; just keep trying or ask for help. Learning something new is an everyday thing. Another example is when I didn't know how to bake a cake, and my aunt helped me, and the cake turned out very well. Learning is a very fun and exciting experience.

The third reason is so they can help you prevent bad things. Bad things never lead to anything good. One time, my sister and I were misbehaving, thinking we wouldn't get in trouble, and we were hitting my 3-year-old sister because she hit us with a bat while playing around. We got grounded afterward and couldn't go to the pool anymore. When you need an opinion on whether you should do something or not, just ask someone, so you can avoid doing something bad. Help others prevent bad things. Bad outcomes are never the best. Working hard is always the best thing to do.

Finally, avoid doing everything that is bad and ask for opinions on whether you should do it or not. Also, learn from your past mistakes and do something better and easier. Sharing experiences can help people make better choices. Easy things can become better in life. Try something new and better every day. People change into better individuals when they receive the best advice. People always have the best advice to give."

Essay to score:
"Can we get more activities done by working on them all the time? Working toward a goal takes time. I know that achieving a goal is one of the proudest accomplishments we can make for ourselves. However, thinking about and working on a goal every day is not the best idea. This is because we do not have time for ourselves, we need to recharge our minds in order to continue with an activity, and stress will enter our lives.

Firstly, to become successful in this world, we need a routine based on productive things and also time for ourselves to do what we desire. We need time to relax and enjoy what this world offers us. Five years ago, I remember my parents being too busy to have a day off and take care of me during the school year. My dad was working at a construction company from Monday through Saturday, and my mom was studying at the university. We did not have time to have a deep conversation and enjoy a day off at home. We needed a break at that moment, but once Spring Break came, we stopped our routine. My parents and I were happy because we knew that we had time to do some fun things, and we stopped worrying about school, work, and study. After the break, we were ready and refreshed to start our routine again. Having a break between activities helps us to give time to restart our minds.

Secondly, humans are able to accomplish great goals, but time is required. When I was in middle school, my teacher always gave us time to relax and stop what we were doing in the classroom. According to my teacher, inactivity provides us with energy and is a way to be able to continue with classwork or activities at school.

Practicing this activity was helpful to me because I could concentrate even more on my school activities. Additionally, when my classmates were tired, they would ask the teacher for a break because they needed that time to clear their minds from worries and stress.

My friends and I needed time where we could interact with others. Getting to know a new person makes me feel important to that person. We need time not only for activities and responsibilities but also to rest and stop worrying about work in order to recharge our minds and become successful.

Finally, stress can lead to depression. It is hard to imagine how difficult life can be. By concentrating more on your required activities than on fun activities, you encounter its negative side. Some people might quit their goals by not having time for themselves. For example, when my older brother went to college, he needed money to pay for college and supplies. He was required to work at a restaurant to earn some money. Once he started college and working at the restaurant, I noticed that he was extremely exhausted, stressed, and quiet. He felt he was not able to finish college. After a couple of days, he quit college and his job because not having time for himself stopped him from trying to reach his goal. He could have reached his goal, but too much activity and stress led him to depression. Breaks are as important as activities in our lives.

Many claim that the earlier and more rapidly you start your activities, the more chances you have to get things done. Additionally, some people believe that breaks are not important or beneficial in achieving a goal and should not be required; however, taking a break between your activities can change your life. Because you have time to recharge your mind, you also have time for yourself, and stress does not affect your well-being. Life is short; do not let activities lead you to depression. Take a break and start again."

Essay to score:
"The Three Years of High School Versus the Traditional Four Years of High School

Some school districts offer programs that allow high school students to graduate in three years instead of the traditional four years. The three-year program should be an idea that more schools offer because it would provide students with an advantage when it comes to having a fresh sense of the information about the subjects.

One of the main reasons why the three-year program is better than the four-year program is time. Time is one of the main influences on high school students, and knowing how to manage time is the key to success. Therefore, the three-year education program takes care of not wasting time and allows students to finish high school in a shorter period, giving them the opportunity to enter college or the workforce one year earlier.

Another advantage for high schoolers enrolled in a three-year program is that they have fresher information due to the fact there is no long pause like summer vacation. They have their classes one after another, which helps them not to forget information and also helps the teacher by having less time to waste on reviewing material.

Although the three-year program may sound perfect, it has one major problem: students enrolled in a four-year program have more time to work on financial savings because they can save money for student loans for a longer time.

In conclusion, the three-year program is better than the four-year program because it gives students the advantage of more efficient time management, a better grasp of the subjects, and a better understanding of how to manage time."

Essay to score:
"Schools that partner with other companies allow students to explore the world through internships and give them a chance to discover if they enjoy the field or not. What do they want to do in the future? Schools should form partnerships with companies because it helps students understand what's best for them, for example, what they are interested in, provides opportunities to explore the world, and aids in developing communication skills with others.

One reason why it's beneficial for students is that they get to discover their interests. If students have the chance to participate in these internships, it allows them to work with a diverse group of people. Working with people from different cultures will teach them how to collaborate and handle various situations. They'll be able to pursue their interests and gain experience as well. Many students are unsure about their future careers. An internship can help them make informed decisions. Often, they don't have the opportunity to explore their true interests. Some students may choose classes simply because their friends are taking them, even if they lack interest, due to uncertainty about their own preferences. Consequently, they might quit the class later, realizing it's not for them. This also creates trouble for school counselors, as they then have to rearrange the students' schedules, which can be problematic. However, an internship can provide clarity about their interests, preventing future confusion.

The next reason is that students receive numerous opportunities to explore the world. It is rare for students to have the chance to learn about the world firsthand. This exploration is something many students desire but unfortunately, not everyone gets the opportunity. Learning about different cultures and making new friends can be incredibly beneficial. When they explore the world, they may learn new languages, which can greatly enhance their employability. In the United States, employers often seek multilingual students because it can improve company effectiveness. Students who speak several languages tend not to hesitate in communicating with others, feeling empowered to achieve their goals.

The last reason is that internships enable students to improve their communication skills. Often, students may be knowledgeable but lack the confidence to speak up. They may feel shy or doubt their abilities. Participating in internships can help them become more confident. By working and interacting with others during an internship, they will overcome their shyness and gain confidence through practice.

Communication is a vital part of life; without it, students may struggle to understand what's happening around them, which can negatively impact their education. Both in and out of school, strong communication skills are essential for self-improvement. Communication not only facilitates the exchange of ideas but also empowers students to speak up. As they become more vocal, they'll gain confidence and become less concerned about others' opinions.

Some argue that internships may not be suitable for all students, as they already have commitments such as sports or after-school jobs. However, if schools establish partnerships with various companies, it could provide an invaluable opportunity for students to explore their interests, discover the world, and become more confident and communicative. This experience can reassure students that they are capable of achieving their goals.

In conclusion, collaborating with companies can help students make decisions more confidently and overcome any shyness. It can also assist them in determining their life's ambitions. These partnerships offer students the chance to learn new things and languages, which would be challenging without the experience of an internship. I believe students should have access to these internships to help them grow and improve."
